document.full_text: raffi torres scored with 19 seconds to play in regulation and roberto luongo earned the shutout as the vancouver canucks stopped the boston bruins 1-0 to draw first blood in the stanley cup finals on wednesday.
document.title: canucks beat bruins to trigger olympic size party
lines_and_colors: raffi torres scored with 19 seconds to play in regulation and roberto luongo earned the shutout as the vancouver canucks stopped the boston bruins 1-0 to draw first blood in the stanley cup finals on wednesday.
